label: DMMZ1
description: Dome Battery Powered Z-Wave Plus Enabled Mousetrap

paramInformation.label: BASIC_SET Level
paramInformation.description: Sets the value sent by the BASIC_SET command to Association Group 2

paramInformation.label: Set Firing Mode
paramInformation.description: This parameter sets the “firing mode” of the Mouser.

paramInformation.label: High Voltage Duration Time
paramInformation.description: How long the Mouser will fire continuously before it starts to burst-fire

paramInformation.label: LED Alarm
paramInformation.description: Enables or disables the indicator LED alarm when the trap is tripped

paramInformation.label: LED Alarm Duration
paramInformation.description: Sets the amount of time the LED Indicator blinks after the trap is tripped
